tool_description: convert image files like jpg and png to WebP format and directly upload / send to your Amazon AWS S3 Bucket without any other call. It is super easy.  Transcoder can compress 100 times original files and 3-5 times compressed jpeg files.
name: C1- Transcode Photo to WebP & Upload Your  AWS S3 Bucket
title: C1- Transcode Photo to WebP & Upload Your  AWS S3 Bucket
tool_name: C1- Transcode Photo to WebP & Upload Your  AWS S3 Bucket

api_list.name: C1- Single PHOTO transcode and upload to AWS s3
api_list.description:
you must have AWS IAM user credentials with "putObject"
if you don't have, then check our A1 api, it returns temporary download link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://c1-transcode-photo-to-webp-upload-your-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/upload-to-aws-s3/photo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "c1-transcode-photo-to-webp-upload-your-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://c1-transcode-photo-to-webp-upload-your-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/upload-to-aws-s3/photo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "c1-transcode-photo-to-webp-upload-your-aws-s3-bucket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
